hotels.title: Five-Star Sofitel Fiji Family-Friendly Luxury on Denarau Island with Beach Club
hotels.description: Find paradise at this five-star family-friendly retreat, boasting fabulous facilities and an unrivalled Port Denarau location. After days spent soaking up Fiji’s endless sunshine and picture-perfect beaches, return to first-class treatments at Sofitel Spa, dance the night away at Republik or savour dinner with a dazzling ocean view at Solis Restaurant. Families will love the resort’s vibrant kids’ club program and babysitting services.

hotels.title: Fiji Luxury Harbourfront Villas 30 Minutes from Nadi International Airport w. Private Pool & Sauna
hotels.description: Step into a world of unparalleled serenity at Trilogy Luxury Villas Denarau, where luxury island living reaches new heights. These incredible villas are your own private playground, featuring multiple pools for cooling off, a sauna and steam room for complete relaxation and a rooftop balcony for sundowners at your own fully-equipped bar. Just minutes from Port Denarau's bustling marina, these villas sit in Fiji's most exclusive resort enclave. Your prime waterfront position puts you steps from fresh seafood at Sails@Denarau, retail therapy at Port Denarau Shopping Centre and a world-class golf course beckons nearby - all while maintaining your private piece of paradise.
